edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.filter
Class PedestrianLocalization_StepDetection

java.lang.Object
  edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.filter.PedestrianLocalization_StepDetection
All Implemented Interfaces:
AccelerometerListener, GyroListener, MagnetometerListener, PedestrianLocalization
public class PedestrianLocalization_StepDetection
extends Object
implements PedestrianLocalization

Localizes pedestrians using accelerometer and magnetometer for heading, and step detection method for tracking movement
